short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get to know all your friends embarrassing secrets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ready to reveal your deepest secrets? Introducing Never Have I Ever, the thrilling Chrome extension that guarantees an unforgettable time.

This is not just a game, it's a party starter, an icebreaker, a boredom buster right in your browser! 

Choose from four fabulous categories and dive into a pool of more than 100 thrilling questions. Dare to break the routine and unleash the fun with Never Have I Ever.

Add it to your Chrome now and let the good times roll!
